mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRANSACTION(TRAN_NO, PROD_NO, BUYER_ID, PAYMENT_OPTION, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_PHONE, DEMAILADDR, DLVY_REQUEST, TRAN_STATUS_CODE, ORDER_DATA, DLVY_DATE, TRAN_AMOUNT) VALUES (seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval,#{purchaseProd.prodNo},#{buyer.userId},#{paymentOption} ,#{receiverName},#{receiverPhone},#{divyAddr},#{divyRequest},#{tranCode},sysdate,#{divyDate},#{tranAmount})
mapper.select: select * from transaction t, users u, product p where t.tran_no = #{value} and t.buyer_id=u.user_id and t.prod_no = p.prod_no
select * from transaction t, users u, product p where p.prod_no = #{value} and t.buyer_id=u.user_id and t.prod_no = p.prod_no

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT buyer_id, RECEIVER_NAME, Receiver_phone, TRAN_STATUS_CODE, TRAN_NO, TRAN_AMOUNT FROM transaction where buyer_id=#{buyerId} order by TRAN_NO) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
mapper.update: update Transaction set TRAN_STATUS_CODE=#{tranCode} where TRAN_NO=#{tranNo}
update Transaction set TRAN_STATUS_CODE=#{tranCode} where PROD_NO=#{purchaseProd.prodNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT buyer_id, RECEIVER_NAME, Receiver_phone, TRAN_STATUS_CODE, TRAN_AMOUNT from transaction where buyer_id=#{value})countTable
